title: Horse latitudes
creator_credit: Peter Rowe, Tony Hall, Canadian Broadcasting Corporation, Clearwater Films and Rosebud Films
brief_description: Entrapped by his own reckless boastfulness, goaded by desire for glory at any price, a yachtsman falsifies radio signals and his ship’s log during a round the world solo race. A superbly photographed and constructed drama.
creator_credit_for_label: Peter Rowe, Tony Hall, Canadian Broadcasting Corporation, Clearwater Films and Rosebud Films
